g.text: Can you fully block access for this persona?
Can you require a compliant device
Can you require MFA for this persona?
Can you require a device ID
Can the persona be blocked to certain applications?
Can the persona be blocked on identity risk?
Can legacy authentication be blocked for the persona
Can you require a device Operating System
Is the persona accessing from the
Follow this flow for each persona in your environment to find out what Conditional Access actions you
can take to make access watertight and secure. A persona can be a group of users
Try to be as specific as possible.
